verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5023><s%> I looked <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, a door <S%G2374><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> was as it were of <S%G5613><s%> a shofar <S%G4536><s%> talking <S%G2980><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>; which said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Come up <S%G305><s%> <S%G5628><s%> hither <S%G5602><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I will shew <S%G1166><s%> <S%G5692><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> <S%G5748><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5635><s%> hereafter <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> I was <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5633><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, a throne <S%G2362><s%> was set <S%G2749><s%> <S%G5711><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> one sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> to look upon <S%G3706><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a jasper <S%G2393><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a sardine <S%G4555><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there was a rainbow <S%G2463><s%> round about <S%G2943><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, in sight <S%G3706><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> unto an emerald <S%G4664><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> round about <S%G2943><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> were four <S%G5064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> twenty <S%G1501><s%> seats <S%G2362><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the seats <S%G2362><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%>, clothed <S%G4016><s%> <S%G5772><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> raiment <S%G2440><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5627><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> crowns <S%G4735><s%> of gold <S%G5552><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> proceeded <S%G1607><s%> <S%G5736><s%> lightnings <S%G796><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thunderings <S%G1027><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there were seven <S%G2033><s%> Menorahs <S%G2985><s%> of fire <S%G4442><s%> burning <S%G2545><s%> <S%G5746><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> there was a sea <S%G2281><s%> of glass <S%G5193><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> unto crystal <S%G2930><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> round about <S%G2945><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, were four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of eyes <S%G3788><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behind <S%G3693><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> was like <S%G3664><s%> a lion <S%G3023><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a calf <S%G3448><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> a face <S%G4383><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the fourth <S%G5067><s%> beast <S%G2226><s%> was like <S%G3664><s%> a flying <S%G4072><s%> <S%G5740><s%> eagle <S%G105><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> those beasts <S%G2226><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G5692><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thanks <S%G2169><s%> to him that sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>,

The four <S%G5064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> fall down <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5699><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> him that sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> <S%G5719><s%> him that liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> <S%G5719><s%> their <S%G846><s%> crowns <S%G4735><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>,

Thou art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%>, O YY <S%G2962><s%>, to receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5629><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> hast created <S%G2936><s%> <S%G5656><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> pleasure <S%G2307><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were created <S%G2936><s%> <S%G5681><s%>.
